price: Enti ͻdanee neho kͻͻ nefiefoͻ hͻ de nantwie a wadͻre nam a yahoͻ (anaasε yatotoo) bae.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajāa biʿij'lin samīnin
